article.title: Northrop Grumman to Support Radar System
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Northrop Grumman Systems Corporation, Linthicum, Maryland, was awarded a $76,727,752 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract. The award will provide for the engineering and technical services in support of the Vehicle and Dismount Exploitation Radar system. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Fort Monmouth, New Jersey, is the contracting activity.
